page.title: 12Holiday Trade
page.content: Although on the edge of the popular tourist area of Exmoor, this area is too sparsely populated for there to be a great concentration of summer visit_ ors.Even so,the first floor of one cottage is let as a self_contained flat.Half of one farm house is let to summer visitors and a prefabricated bungalow on the next_door farm is also let. On one farm,visitors are welcomed in the house,while the family use an old railway carriage during the summer. Another farmhouse has a wing converted for holiday visitors. The only other facilities for tourists in this square are on the A361,where there is a licenced rest_ aurant and a filling station.Two young people have worked in a wine bar in Dulverton in the school holidays, and one works in the local inn.
